scenario.name: Basic Sipstone UAC
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:[$host] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port] To: <sip:[$user]@[$host]:[remote_port]> From: <sip:[$user]@[$host]:[remote_port]> Contact: <sip:[$user]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;transport=[transport] Expires: 300 Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 REGISTER Content-Length: 0

REGISTER sip:[$host] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port] To: <sip:[$user]@[$host]:[remote_port]> From: <sip:[$user]@[$host]:[remote_port]> Contact: <sip:[$user]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;transport=[transport] Expires: 300 Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 REGISTER Content-Length: 0 [authentication username=abcd password=pass2]

REGISTER sip:[$host] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port] To: <sip:[$user]@[$host]:[remote_port]> From: <sip:[$user]@[$host]:[remote_port]> Contact: <sip:[$user]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;transport=[transport] Expires: 300 Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 REGISTER Content-Length: 0

REGISTER sip:[$host] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port] To: <sip:[$user]@[$host]:[remote_port]> From: <sip:[$user]@[$host]:[remote_port]> Contact: <sip:[$user]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;transport=[transport] Expires: 300 Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 REGISTER Content-Length: 0 [authentication username=efgh password=pass]

INVITE sip:abcd@[$host]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:efgh@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:abcd@[$host]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: sip:efgh@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000

ACK sip:abcd@[$host]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port] From: sipp <sip:efgh@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:abcd@[$host]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 ACK Contact: sip:efgh@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Length: 0

INVITE sip:abcd@[$host]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:efgh@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:abcd@[$host]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: sip:efgh@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len] [authentication username=efgh password=pass]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000
